channel.title: Old PC Error
channel.description:
I get this on start-up of my old pc
The following file is missing or corrupted: C:\Windows\Ifshlp.sys The following file is missing or corrupted: C:\Windows\System\Vmm32.vxd Type the name of the Windows loader (e.g., C:\Windows\System\Vmm32.vxd
Now I was wondering if there is anyway I can fix this problem without erasing the data on the computer as it is extremely old and I don't think I have played rs on that computer since 05-06 so it might have a nice old client on it. Was wondering if anyone knew on these forums. I googled and they said to just do a repair instead of a reinstall of your windows, but I don't have a windows ME installation disk anymore and I wasn't sure if installing windows 7 (disk I do have) would erase the data or not. Thanks for any help.

item.title: Old PC Error
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

I’ve just uploaded an old boot cd I got when I was at Work Experience at IT Warehouse. I haven’t really looked at it much - just had it for a rainy day, so I can’t tell if it’d be helpful, but I know there are a number of recovery tools on it.

https://rapidshare.com/files/1809430992/BootCD.iso

Hopefully you can find your way around it.

Read full topic

item.title: Old PC Error
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

BloodRayne:

Can you just plug the hard drive into another(working) computer and transfer the files you need? Assuming the ME filesystem is the same as XP, it should work

This is what I was going to try to do, but I wasn’t sure if it would work as it said the dll’s missing were on the C drive, which is also where I would like to recover the files from. “C:\Windows\Ifshlp.sys” Also, if a virus was believed to cause the damage to the C drive, would it have any risk in plugging it into the XP system?

Read full topic

item.title: Old PC Error
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

download an ooooooooold linux livecd and see if you can boot off of that to recover any data

you can download a recent livecd but chances are it won’t work if it’s old hardware

Read full topic

item.title: Old PC Error
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

What if I found a windows me installation disk? Just being optimistic.

Read full topic

item.title: Old PC Error
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

You will need to do a repair and it will require the windows disk so your fucked. Installing windows 7 wont help because it sounds like the computer is fucking old so that wont do you any good either.

Read full topic
